I had mixed feelings for "Les Valseuses" (1974) written and directed by Bertrand Blier when I started watching it but I ended up loving it. Some people may think that there was a lot of nudity in the film. Yes, there was, but according to my boyfriend who has seen many other French films like this one, Les Valseuses is not much worse that those with regards to nudity.
